content: new ears warmer by emily o brien pattern by new ears warmer this super simple pattern works up extremely quickly great for a last minute gift or a mindless fast knit for the movie theater sizes child adult small adult large gauge yarn 20 sts = 4 in stockinette worsted 50/46 60/55 70/64 yds/m instructions cast on 78 90 96 sts yarn shown in photos is malabrigo rios in the join to work in the round and place beginning cereza colorway of round marker needles 4x2 ribbing us7/4 5mm 16 /40cm circular needle k4 p2 around notions work 4x2 ribbing for 2 5 3 3 darning needle stitch marker bind off in pattern weave in all ends 2 © emily o brien 2017 all rights reserved more patterns kitties are cute hat about the designer emily has been knitting since she was 12 years old she has been published in collections from knit picks i like knitting knit now and sparkle and fluff has popular self-published patterns on ravelry aside from yarn she loves both kitties and cupcakes you can find her on ravelry and instagram as @kittywithacupcake @kittywithacupcake kittywithacupcake com geodesic cowl 3 © emily o brien 2017 all rights reserved
